constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 3 (Tuesday, January 5, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BURGESS:
H.R. 191.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This legislation would repeal existing federal law which
was passed under the claimed constitutional authority of
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3, often referred to as the
``Commerce Clause.''
[Page H73]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.

title: Energy Efficiency Free Market Act of 2021
